You'll be|able to finish the item in no time at all.<color_yellow>★★★<color_white>So please be careful... Also, when you're|making a normal game, the chance of getting a|new challenge goes up a bit!

13.<%sL_RECIPE>を 作るには|<pc>の 調理職人レベルが|<%nL_H: To create a <%sL_RECIPE>, use the|<pc> The cook level of <%nL_HITUYOU_LV> or higher|is required...<end>

14.調理とは フライパンにのせた 具材を焼いて|目的のアイテムを 作ることです。|<:
Cooking is when you cook the ingredients on|the pan to create the desired item. As you|cook the ingredients, the browning meter|
|rises. When the meter is full, the|ingredients are ready to eat... All the|ingredients are ready to eat. The quality of|
|the final product is determined by the|accuracy of this... To execute a cooking|command, you must concentrate. If you lose|
|concentration, you won't be able to execute|them, so pace yourself and choose your|commands... The closer the ingredients are to|
|the center of the pan, the higher the|browning meter will be, so adjust the|position of the ingredients... If the game is|
|interrupted during the cooking process due to|a communication error, all ingredients will|be lost.

15.調理の遊び方の説明です！|<br>|毎ターン 具材を焼く度に|各具材の 焼き加減:
Here's how to play cooking! Each turn, as you|cook an ingredient, the doneness meter for|each ingredient goes up. When the doneness|
|meter is full... When the browning meter is|full, the ingredients are ready to eat. When|all the ingredients are ready to eat, use the|
|"finish" command. But be careful, because if|the meter fills up again, the ingredients|will be burnt and burned... The closer the|
|ingredients are to the center of the pan, the|easier it is for the burn meter to rise.|Let's aim for perfection while paying|
|attention to our concentration!

33.ダブルたて返しを使うと |縦横２マスにある 上下の具材を|入れ替えることができま: With the double flap, you can swap the top|and bottom ingredients in the two squares...

34.ダブルよこ返しを使うと |縦横２マスにある 左右の具材を|入れ替えることができま: Using the double yoko-tsuki, you can swap the|ingredients on the left and right sides of|the two squares...

35.ななめムーブを使うと|ななめのマスに 具材を移動することができます。: You can use the move to move the ingredients|to a square in a diagonal line...

36.弱火焼きを使うと|全てのマスを ４ターンの間|半分の火力で 焼くことができます。: When you use low fire, you can burn all the|squares at half power for four turns.

37.強火焼きを使うと|全てのマスを ４ターンの間|強い火力で 焼くことができます。: When you use high fire, you can burn all the|squares for four turns with high heat.

38.まぜあわせを使うと|上下左右にある 同じ種類の具材と|焼き加減を 揃えることがで: With the Maze-a-Maze-boshi, you can match the|same type of ingredients on the top, bottom,|left and right sides of the pan...

39.ねらい焼きを使うと|選択したマスを 通常より高い会心率で|焼くことができます。: With Aimed Burn, you can burn selected|squares at a higher rate of attack than|normal...

40.完熱封じを使ったマスは しばらくの間|何をしても 焼けなくなります。: The trout that used the full heat seal won't|burn for a while, no matter what you do...

41.たて返しを使うと |縦２マスにある 上下の具材を|入れ替えることができます。: By using the vertical flipside, you can swap|the top and bottom ingredients in the two|vertical squares...

42.トップターンを使うと|上の列にある具材を 下の列まで|一気に飛ばすことができます: Using the top turn, the ingredients in the|top row can be flown all the way down to the|bottom row...

43.よこ返しを使うと |横２マスにある 左右の具材を|入れ替えることができます。: If you use the yoko-tsugi, you can switch the|ingredients in the two horizontal squares...
